price: 113. Certes, tous ne sont pas pareils. Il y a, parmi les gens du Livre, ceux qui, de nuit, récitent les versets d’Allah et se prosternent.
arabic: ۞ لَيۡسُواْ سَوَآءٗۗ مِّنۡ أَهۡلِ ٱلۡكِتَٰبِ أُمَّةٞ قَآئِمَةٞ يَتۡلُونَ ءَايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ ءَانَآءَ ٱلَّيۡلِ وَهُمۡ يَسۡجُدُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: laysū sawāan min ahli al-kitābi ummatun qāimatun yatlūna āyāti al-lahi ānāa al-layli wahum yasjudūna
